summary: Changes the female houscarls into males and changes the 2 male houscarls
descriptionHtml:
REQUIREMENTS: Dragonborn, Apachii v_1_5 full and Male_v_1_1

This was inspired by Urshis Hot Male Houscarls http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17163//?. Since I like the idea, but my tastes differ, I made my own version. I left theirs traits as they were, except for their levels and the Whiterun Houscarl being marriable.

Right now I can only offer you CK pics. In-game pics greatly wanted.

They all wear Nordic carved and either a Nordic sword or War Axe, along with a shield (that should be in their inventory). I also gave each facial hair and two now have warpaint.

Argis: Just changed his hairstyle and his eyecolor from Amber to Green

Hlard (Iona Replacer): Sports now heterochromia and Boethias tattoo. Changed his weight to a minimum.  Male Nord voice

Jolgar the Sword-Man (Jordis replacer): Hairstyle, eye color and warpaint. Male Brute voice

Lysander the Bear-Slayer (Lydia replacer): Thought everyones favorite Housecarl deserved a title, made his hair darker. Male brute voice

Calder: changed that aweful beard, hairstyle and eyecolor.


Recomended mods/mods used:
Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815//?
ApachiiSkyHair natural retex by Aron http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35092/?
Covereyes by Mr Lenski http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869//? (I am interested how other eye texters might look)
aMidianBorns Book of Silence http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909//?
Beards by Itoth http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363//?
Brows by Itoth http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411/?
Dalls Scars http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4550//? (I prefer my scars to look fresh and new)
author: YuanMonos
